name: render-backend
description: Render deployment config for IMU Running Gait backend

services.name: imu-gait-backend
services.buildCommand: pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && git submodule update --init --recursive
notes: Render sets PORT automatically; server.py reads PORT.
Ensure headgait submodule is pulled: git submodule update --init --recursive.
